attributes.action: Change the rules so that nobody can become an MP unless they have worked for at least 20 years in the private sector first.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some MPs who hold high position in government have never worked in the private sector.  How can they possibly begin to understand the problems and challenges that private businesses face, and propose policies which affect such, sometimes in a detrimental way? e.g. the recent Equality Bill.  Someone who has worked in the private sector for a good number of years will have a much better understanding of the problems and challenges that businesses face on a daily basis, which would in a sense serve as a reality check.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
